definition: to rent/to lease
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
concession (territory)

sentences.english: Paul Konchesky has gone out on loan to Nottingham Forest.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀已經租借給了諾丁漢森林。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Wolves want to sign Liverpool midfielder Jay Spearing on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，狼隊希望租借斯皮靈一年。

sentences.english: The Royals have taken Chelsea's England Under-21 left-back Bertrand on loan.
sentences.chinese: 切爾西的英格蘭U21國腳伯特蘭將通過租借加盟。

sentences.english: Krisztian Nemeth today completed a loan switch to Championship side Blackpool.
sentences.chinese: 內梅斯今天完成了租借至英冠球隊布萊克浦的轉會。

sentences.english: He spent much of last season on loan at Tottenham Hotspur (he moved to White Hart Lane when the Reds bought Dimitar Berbatov) where he made 21 appearances.
sentences.chinese: 他上賽季大部分時間都在熱刺租借，出場21次。

sentences.english: Liverpool are trying to thrash out a deal with Real Madrid to land Ruud van Nistelrooy on a six-month loan next week.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦正在嘗試與皇馬討論下個星期租借範尼六個月。

sentences.english: He was on loan at Derby last season.
sentences.chinese: 上賽季他被租借在德比城。

sentences.english: The Uruguay international is set to sign for the French club on-loan to the end of this season.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉圭國腳下半賽季將可能被租借到法甲的波爾多隊。

sentences.english: The nature of the Territory was not a lease territory, but a concession.
sentences.chinese: 英租威海衛的性質並非“租借地”而是“割據地”。

sentences.english: Out-on-loan winger Bebe is, coincidentally, also out injured.
sentences.chinese: 巧合的是，即使租借在外的貝貝也受傷了。

sentences.english: Mannone and Szczesny will continue their development on loan.
sentences.chinese: 曼諾內和什琴斯尼將被繼續租借鍛鍊。

sentences.english: He began renting all the Chan movies he could find.
sentences.chinese: 他開始租借能找到的所有的陳查理電影。

sentences.english: Hodgson has allowed the Swiss defender Philipp Degen to join Stuttgart on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 老霍同意將瑞士人德根租借到斯圖加特一年。

sentences.english: There is usually ski equipment rental, visitors are not anti-rent.
sentences.chinese: 通常滑雪場有器材出租，遊客不防租借。

sentences.english: The Jiao Customs is the first concession customs in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 膠海關是近代中國第一個租借地海關。

sentences.english: Arsène Wenger has revealed that Denilson is set to go back to Brazil on loan.
sentences.chinese: 溫格透露德尼爾森即將以租借的形式回到巴西。

definition: to buy out/buyout/severance
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
TEDA (Tianjin Economic Development Area)
transfer fee/signing bonus/sign-on bonus
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
to study abroad (old term)/same as 留學|留学
to leave one's post
to become a member of an alliance or union/to align/to join/participate
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to terminate an agreement/to cancel a contract
Groningen, province and city in the Netherlands
Bremen (city in Germany)
national security (abbr. for 國家安全|国家安全[guo2 jia1 an1 quan2])/national security act/state security agency
to renew or extend a contract
to poach (talent, personnel from competitors)/to raid (a competitor for its talent)/Taiwan pr. [wa1 jiao3]
